alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Lexington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lexington and northeastern Aiken Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 442 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Aiken State Park, or 20 miles southeast of Batesburg-Leesville, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wagener, Pelion, Perry, Perry Airport, Thor, Lexington County Airport At Pelion, Steedman, Peachtree Rock and Cedar Pond Campground. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 40 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
